00047 void CHPQuantificationDetectionFileReaderTest::testCreation()
00048 {
00049         CHPQuantificationDetectionFileReader reader;
00050         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);

00052 
00053 void CHPQuantificationDetectionFileReaderTest::testRead()
00054 {
00055         CHPQuantificationDetectionData data;
00056         CHPQuantificationDetectionFileReader reader;
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename("../data/CHP_quantification_detection_file"));
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00059 
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == "../data/CHP_quantification_detection_file");
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgName() == L"sig");
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgVersion() == L"1.0");
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"test3");
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 2);
00065         
00066         ParameterNameValueTypeList params = data.GetAlgParams();
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 1);
00068         ParameterNameValueTypeList::iterator it=params.begin();
00069         ParameterNameValueType param = *it;
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"an1");
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"av1");
00072 
00073         params = data.GetSummaryParams();
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 1);
00075         it=params.begin();
00076         param = *it;
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"sn1");
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"sv1");
00079 
00080         ProbeSetQuantificationDetectionData e;
00081         data.GetQuantificationDetectionEntry(0, e);
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "abc");
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.quantification == 10.0f);
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.pvalue == 0.1f);
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.id == -1);
00086         data.GetQuantificationDetectionEntry(1, e);
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "xyz");
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.quantification == 20.0f);
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.pvalue == 0.2f);
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.id == -1);
00091 }
00092 
00093 void CHPQuantificationDetectionFileReaderTest::testReadId()
00094 {
00095         CHPQuantificationDetectionData data;
00096         CHPQuantificationDetectionFileReader reader;
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename("../data/CHP_quantification_detection_file_id"));
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00099 
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == "../data/CHP_quantification_detection_file_id");
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgName() == L"sig");
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgVersion() == L"1.0");
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"test3");
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 2);
00105         
00106         ParameterNameValueTypeList params = data.GetAlgParams();
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 1);
00108         ParameterNameValueTypeList::iterator it=params.begin();
00109         ParameterNameValueType param = *it;
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"an1");
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"av1");
00112 
00113         params = data.GetSummaryParams();
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 1);
00115         it=params.begin();
00116         param = *it;
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"sn1");
00118         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"sv1");
00119 
00120         ProbeSetQuantificationDetectionData e;
00121         data.GetQuantificationDetectionEntry(0, e);
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.id == 10);
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.quantification == 10.0f);
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.pvalue == 0.1f);
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "");
00126         data.GetQuantificationDetectionEntry(1, e);
00127         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.id == 20);
00128         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.quantification == 20.0f);
00129         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.pvalue == 0.2f);
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "");
00131 }
